processingCommand.script:
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &IBM_MQ_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,IBM_MQ_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &OPENJDK1_8_64_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,OPENJDK1_8_64_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &OPENJDK11_64_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,OPENJDK11_64_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &OPENJDK17_64_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,OPENJDK17_64_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &ORACLE_JAVA_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,ORACLE_JAVA_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)

:PUB &TZ# 
:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &IBM_MQ_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &OPENJDK1_8_64_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &OPENJDK11_64_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &OPENJDK17_64_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &ORACLE_JAVA_SCRIPT_NAME# 
:PUB &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# 

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null" OR ""
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

! Instances
:DEFINE &AINSTANCES#, STRING, 6
:FILL &AINSTANCES#[] = STR_SPLIT("&INSTANCES#", ",")
:PUBLISH &AINSTANCES#[],,WORKFLOW

! First Instance
:SET &FIRST_INSTANCE_NAME# = &AINSTANCES#[1]
:PUBLISH  &FIRST_INSTANCE_NAME#,,WORKFLOW

! Modules
:SET &REST_MODULES# = "WMS,REFS,RW,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

! Restart type
:SET &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER", 1)
:PUBLISH &RESTART_TYPE_PARAMETER#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

!:SET &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID# = ""
!:PUBLISH &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:IF &CHILD_SERVICE# = "JDA WM - TEST"
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:ELSE
:  SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:  SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.MW-PATCHING.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW

! Server Name
:DEFINE &ASERVER_NAME#, STRING, 2
:FILL &ASERVER_NAME#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SERVER_NAME#, ".")
:SET &SERVER_NAME_NFQD# = &ASERVER_NAME#[1]
:PUBLISH &SERVER_NAME_NFQD#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW

! Java version
:SET &NEW_JAVA_VERSION# = ""

:IF &OPENJDK_11_64_INSTALL# = "Y"
:  SET &NEW_JAVA_VERSION# = STR_CAT(&NEW_JAVA_VERSION#, "OPENJDK_11_64_VERSION: &OPENJDK_11_64_VERSION# ")
:ENDIF

:IF &OPENJDK_17_64_INSTALL# = "Y"
:  SET &NEW_JAVA_VERSION# = STR_CAT(&NEW_JAVA_VERSION#, "OPENJDK_17_64_VERSION: &OPENJDK_17_64_VERSION# ")
:ENDIF

:IF &OPENJDK_1_8_64_INSTALL# = "Y"
:  SET &NEW_JAVA_VERSION# = STR_CAT(&NEW_JAVA_VERSION#, "OPENJDK_1_8_64_VERSION: &OPENJDK_1_8_64_VERSION# ")
:ENDIF

:IF &ORACLE_JAVA_INSTALL# = "Y"
:  SET &NEW_JAVA_VERSION# = STR_CAT(&NEW_JAVA_VERSION#, "ORACLE_JAVA_VERSION: &ORACLE_JAVA_VERSION# ")
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &NEW_JAVA_VERSION#,,WORKFLOW
